pr_title: Enable arg file for resolver path to avoid arg too long errors.

timeline.message: Enable arg file for resolver path to avoid arg too long errors.

timeline.bodyText: Nice. Thanks @evanw555 for convincing me to extract isArgFile(String) to a utility class.
timeline.author: DPUkyle

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure you want to globally enable this feature? Evan and I reserved it as off by default, and allowing consumers with javaexec issues to opt-in in their build.gradle files.
timeline.author: DPUkyle

replies.bodyText: +1 on this. We've seen before that gradle-plugins and restli-tools are not always locked to the same version. Kyle and I think it's better to keep it opt-in for now, then make it enabled by default later (or if/when we create newer more resilient tools)
replies.author: evanw555

replies.bodyText: Actually, after thinking about this a little harder, I've realized that: convertXXXToPdl and reformatXXXPdl are not part of the normal build process, so enabling arg file by default may not be that risky. However, the same cannot be said for generateXXXDataTemplate or XXXTranslateSchemas; these should be opt-in IMO.
replies.author: evanw555

timeline.author: evanw555

replies.bodyText: Remove the property based logic. We can enable this using task args directly.
